parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: IdeasDatabaseConnectionNew-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: IdeasDatabaseConnectionNew Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=tcp:ideasservernewnew.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog=myDatabase;Integrated Security=True;Persist Security Info=False;User ID=azureuser;Password=Reema123456;MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;Connection Timeout=30;
